text: appeal addehattinre janatayil ninn avisvasiccavaraya pramanimar parannu: nannalepealeyulla manusyanayitt matrame ninne nannal kanunnullu. nannalute kuttattil erravum nis'saranmarayittullavar prathamaviksanattil (sariyayi cintikkate) ninne pintutarnnatayitt matraman nannal kanunnatâ€Œ. ninnalkk nannalekkal yatearu sresthatayum nannal kanunnumilla. pratyuta, ninnal vyajavadikalanenn nannal karutunnu
